DOC.brief_summary: The main goal study pilot test community-based buprenorphine treatment ( CBBT ) intervention , examine buprenorphine treatment initiation , opioid use , HIV risk behavior . Two group participant follow 60 day , 3 research visit . One group enrol prior CBBT intervention ( pre-intervention ) , one group CBBT intervention ( post-intervention ) . Data source include questionnaire , urine toxicology test , medical record data . We hypothesize compare participant pre-intervention group , participant post-intervention group likely initiate buprenorphine treatment , reduce opioid use , reduce high-risk HIV risk behavior .
DOC.brief_title: Pilot Test Community-based Buprenorphine Treatment Intervention
